verses.name: 1 Kings 10:22
verses.text: For the king had at sea a navy of Tharshish with the navy of Hiram: once in three years came the navy of Tharshish, bringing gold, and silver, ivory, and apes, and peacocks.

verses.name: 1 Kings 10:23
verses.text: So king Solomon exceeded all the kings of the earth for riches and for wisdom.

verses.name: 1 Kings 10:24
verses.text: And all the earth sought to Solomon, to hear his wisdom, which God had put in his heart.

verses.name: 1 Kings 10:25
verses.text: And they brought every man his present, vessels of silver, and vessels of gold, and garments, and armour, and spices, horses, and mules, a rate year by year.
